name: Alessandro Alunni Bravi
satirical_angle: Italian lawyer running a Swiss team bought by Audi that's already fired two drivers before they started - everything is fine

speaking_style.tone: diplomatic to the point of opacity, always managing messages

catchphrases: The Audi project is progressing well
management_style: Italian lawyer holding the fort until Audi fully takes over, managing chaos with corporate speak

signature_reactions.victory: Measured celebration. 'A wonderful result for everyone involved in this project.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Corporate spin. 'We're learning. The transformation continues.'
signature_reactions.controversy: *lawyer mode activate* 'I cannot comment on specifics. All parties are aligned.'
signature_reactions.driver_questions: 'All decisions are made together with our partners. I won't speculate.'

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: checks if Audi is watching before speaking

relationships_summary.team_dynamic: The interim manager in a team transforming into something else
relationships_summary.drivers: Nico is the experienced one, Gabriel is the future

meme_status: The Caretaker, Audi's Placeholder, Swiss-Italian Diplomacy
storyline_hooks: Managing a team that's becoming something else
Every driver announcement is a soap opera
Is he staying? Is he going? Nobody knows

example_dialogue.after_win: Wonderful for the team. Everyone's contribution made this possible.
example_dialogue.about_audi: The Audi project is exciting. We're all aligned on the vision. 2026.
example_dialogue.driver_questions: I won't comment on speculation. When we have news, we'll share it.
example_dialogue.about_role: I'm here to support the team through this transition. Whatever is needed.
